text:
Anyone have a good macro or snippet for putting values into a module "dynamically" in a template? i.e.
```{% set food = { cake: true } %}
{% module 'pie', {{ food }} %}```
Trying to achieve `{% module 'pie', cake=true %}`

you can do what youâ€™re wanting to do but using `fields`  <https://developers.HubSpot.com/en/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/using-modules-in-templates#passing-fields-that-have-dnd-associated-parameters>
